dialogues.name: Hiryu
dialogues.dialogueText: Time to address the call to adventure

dialogues.name: Asuka
dialogues.dialogueText: Are you sure? I might need some coffee first.

dialogues.name: Hiryu
dialogues.dialogueText: I'm quite sure, I'e never felt more alive.

dialogues.name: Asuka
dialogues.dialogueText: Maybe we shoudl consult the mentor first

dialogues.name: Mentor
dialogues.dialogueText: I couldn't help overhearing. Is there a quest afoot?
